statements: SELECT * FROM rental_reservations WHERE rental_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM rental_reservations WHERE bicycle_model = 'Mountain Bike';
SELECT rental_date, return_date, customer_name FROM rental_reservations WHERE customer_phone = '555-1234';
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, bicycle_model FROM rental_reservations WHERE rental_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations WHERE rental_date >= '2021-01-01' AND return_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, bicycle_model FROM rental_reservations WHERE reservation_id > 100 AND reservation_id < 200 ORDER BY reservation_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, customer_phone FROM rental_reservations WHERE bicycle_model LIKE '%mountain%' AND customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' AND bicycle_model = 'City Cruiser' ORDER BY rental_date ASC;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM rental_reservations ORDER BY customer_name, reservation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM rentals;
SELECT rental_id, customer_id, rental_date FROM rentals WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT model, type FROM bicycles WHERE rental_price > 50.00;
SELECT rental_id, customer_id, rental_date, return_date FROM rentals ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT bike_id, model, type, rental_price FROM bicycles WHERE type = 'Mountain Bike';
SELECT * FROM rentals WHERE rental_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT rental_id, customer_id, rental_date FROM rentals WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM bicycles WHERE rental_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY model ASC;
SELECT rental_id, rental_date, return_date FROM rentals JOIN bicycles ON rentals.customer_id = bicycles.bike_id WHERE rentals.customer_id = 456 ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT rentals.rental_id, rentals.rental_date, bicycles.model, bicycles.type FROM rentals JOIN bicycles ON rentals.customer_id = bicycles.bike_id WHERE rentals.rental_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations;
SELECT rental_id, rental_date, return_date FROM rental_reservations;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone = '1234567890';
SELECT bicycle_id, bicycle_model, bicycle_type FROM bicycles ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone = '123-456-7890'
SELECT bicycle_model, bicycle_type, rental_price FROM bicycles ORDER BY rental_price DESC
SELECT rental_id, customer_id, bicycle_id, rental_date, return_date FROM rental_reservations WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, bicycle_model FROM customers c JOIN rental_reservations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN bicycles b ON r.bicycle_id = b.bicycle_id
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT reservation_id, rental_date, return_date, customer_id, bicycle_id FROM rental_reservations ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT model, type, price_per_hour FROM bicycles WHERE price_per_hour > 10.00 ORDER BY price_per_hour ASC;
SELECT rental_id, reservation_id, rental_date, return_date, total_cost FROM rental_history WHERE total_cost < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN rental_reservations ON customers.customer_id = rental_reservations.customer_id
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT bicycle_id, model, type, price_per_hour FROM bicycles WHERE price_per_hour > 15 ORDER BY price_per_hour DESC
SELECT rental_date, return_date, total_cost FROM rental_history WHERE total_cost < 100 ORDER BY rental_date ASC, total_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND return_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT model, brand, color FROM bikes WHERE type = 'Mountain';
SELECT rental_date, return_date, bike_id FROM rentals ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, address, city, capacity FROM bike_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM rental_reservations WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT model, brand, color FROM bikes WHERE type = 'Mountain Bike';
SELECT location_name, city, capacity FROM bike_locations WHERE capacity > 20 ORDER BY location_name DESC;

SELECT r.rental_id, r.rental_date, r.return_date, b.model, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM rentals r JOIN bikes b ON r.bike_id = b.bike_id JOIN rental_reservations rr ON r.reservation_id = rr.reservation_id JOIN customers c ON rr.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE r.rental_date >= '2022-01-01' AND r.return_date <= '2022-12-31';
